name: The Infinite Library
description:
How to Play
  • NOTE: Not a real screensaver. Will likely not save a screen, this is a just for fun toy.
  • Watch the books as they go by.
  • You can access settings by scrolling to the bottom of the window.
  • If the speed is set high enough, some sounds will not play.
  • "Speaking" the book titles only works on speed one.
  • If you turn on "Haunted Books" there are scary sounds and the book image will be glitchy looking for random books.
Credits Game
